I will occupy, I will help you die, I will run through you, now I rule you too.
A reaper of souls; a harvest of minds, willing or not, their wills be bind.
A chill wind surges across the land, necrotic energy infusing with the bodies of the dead to spirit them towards the nearest battlefield.
Shackled by the chains of life, a saviour arrives to set these mortals free.
